channel.title: CVE Feed for Linux kernel -- OverlayFS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Linux kernel -- OverlayFS

item.title: CVE-2012-0055|2024-08-06T18:09:17.246Z -- linux%20kernel -- overlayfs
item.description: OverlayFS in the Linux kernel before 3.0.0-16.28, as used in Ubuntu 10.0.4 LTS and 11.10, is missing inode security checks which could allow attackers to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.
